dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile shows the main open water bodies in Uganda for 2005-2006. These data are intended for researchers, students, policy makers and the general public for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production. Uganda Bureau of Statistics. (2012). Open Water Bodies: Uganda 2005. Uganda Bureau of Statistics. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/hw418ss5776 This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
